title: The Atlantic community: introducing the Netherlands
creator_contributor_role: North Atlantic Treaty Organization, production company

description: Life in the Netherlands, showing old towns and new suburbs, the network of canals and rivers, and traditional crafts and modern industries. Today the Netherlands occupy a unique position in the Atlantic Community and NATO as the gateway to North-Eastern Europe.
